H

handleEnemyCombat() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.Application
This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on the outcome of the game's probability based combat functions relating to it's enemy object.
handleInput() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.UserInterface
Validates user input and performs commands based on what was input by the user and what was a valid input at the time the user made the input.
handlePlayerCombat() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.Application
This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on the outcome of the game's probability based combat functions relating to it's player object.
hasEscaped() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.Game
Checks to see if the player has completed the required number of steps to end the game.
HEALTH_RESTORED - Static variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.items.Medpac
Constant for the amount of health restored by the Medpac.
HEALTH_SPAWN_CHANCE - Static variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.Game
Constant for the probability that a medpac spawns after encounter.
hitPoints - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Actor
The hit points.
HP - Static variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Enemy
The Constant HP.
HP - Static variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Player
Constant for the Player's initial and maximum HP.
